title: Add animations, interactive elements, hero section, testimonials, countdown timer, carousel, and smooth scroll navigation

requirements.summary: Add smooth hover effects, fade-in animations on scroll, and slide transitions throughout the app
acceptanceCriteria: Cards and section elements fade in or slide up when they enter the viewport
Hover effects are applied to interactive cards and navigation links
Transitions feel smooth and do not cause layout shift

file_operations.description: Add CSS keyframe animations for fade-in, slide-up, and hover effects; ensure animations respect prefers-reduced-motion accessibility setting
Create a custom hook using Intersection Observer API to detect when elements enter the viewport and trigger fade-in or slide-up animations
Apply useScrollAnimation hook to feature cards, sections, and list items; add hover effect classes to interactive elements
Apply fade-in scroll animations to subscription tier display and content request history cards using useScrollAnimation hook
Apply scroll animations to pricing tier cards and add hover scale effects to plan selection buttons
Add smooth hover effects to navigation links in the header

requirements.summary: Add pulse and ripple click animations to all primary call-to-action buttons
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a primary button triggers a visible ripple or pulse effect
The animation completes without blocking the button's action
Effect is applied consistently across all CTA buttons

file_operations.description: Add CSS keyframe animations for ripple and pulse effects on button clicks; ensure animations respect prefers-reduced-motion
Create a custom hook that handles ripple animation logic on click events, returning a ref and click handler to be applied to buttons
Apply useRippleEffect hook to 'Get Started' and other primary CTA buttons on the landing page
Apply ripple effect to all pricing tier selection buttons using useRippleEffect hook
Apply ripple effect to the 'Generate Content' button and other primary action buttons
Apply ripple effect to the login/logout button in the navigation header

requirements.summary: Add a bold hero section at the top of the LandingPage with banner, headline, subheadline, and CTA
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is the first visible section on the landing page
Contains a headline, subheadline, and at least one CTA button
Visually distinct from the rest of the page using background gradient or image treatment
CTA button links to the pricing page or triggers login

file_operations.description: Create a hero section component with a vibrant gradient background, bold headline ('Viral Growth OS - Content That Converts'), compelling subheadline, and a prominent CTA button linking to pricing; integrate the generated hero banner image (frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1200x480.png) as a visual element
Import and render HeroSection component as the first section at the top of the page, before existing feature and how-it-works sections

requirements.summary: Add a testimonials/reviews section to the LandingPage with fictional customer quotes
acceptanceCriteria: Section displays at least 3 testimonial cards
Each card includes a quote, customer name, and role/title
Section is visually styled consistently with the app's vibrant color scheme

file_operations.description: Create a testimonials section component displaying 3 fictional customer testimonial cards with quotes, names, roles, and avatar initials; style with vibrant accent colors consistent with the app theme
Import and render TestimonialsSection component after the how-it-works section and before the final CTA

requirements.summary: Add a countdown timer component to the LandingPage creating urgency for promotional deadline
acceptanceCriteria: Countdown timer displays days, hours, minutes, and seconds
Timer updates every second in real time
Timer is placed in a prominent location on the landing page (e.g., near the hero or pricing section)
When countdown reaches zero, a fallback message is shown

file_operations.description: Create a countdown timer component that counts down to a hardcoded promotional deadline (e.g., 7 days from now), updating every second with days, hours, minutes, and seconds display; show a fallback message ('Offer ended - check back soon!') when countdown reaches zero
Create a custom hook that manages countdown state, calculates time remaining from a target date, and updates every second using setInterval; return formatted time units and isExpired flag
Import and render CountdownTimer component in a prominent location near the hero section or above the pricing CTA with messaging like 'Limited Time Offer - Act Now!'

requirements.summary: Add an image carousel/gallery section to the LandingPage showcasing product features
acceptanceCriteria: Carousel displays at least 3 slides with image/illustration and descriptive text
Auto-advances every 4â€“5 seconds
Manual previous/next navigation arrows are present and functional
Dot indicators show the current slide position
Slides transition smoothly

file_operations.description: Create a feature carousel component displaying 3 slides using the generated carousel images (frontend/public/assets/generated/carousel-slide-1.dim_800x400.png, carousel-slide-2.dim_800x400.png, carousel-slide-3.dim_800x400.png); implement auto-advance every 4 seconds, manual previous/next arrows, dot indicators, and smooth slide transitions
Create a custom hook managing carousel state including current slide index, auto-advance timer, manual navigation handlers (next, prev, goTo), and cleanup on unmount
Import and render FeatureCarousel component after the hero section and before the how-it-works section

requirements.summary: Implement smooth scroll navigation on the LandingPage with anchor links
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links on the landing page scroll smoothly to their target sections
Each major section of the landing page has a corresponding anchor ID
Active section is visually highlighted in the navigation as the user scrolls
Scroll behavior is smooth (CSS scroll-behavior: smooth or JS equivalent)

file_operations.description: Add unique anchor IDs to major sections (hero, features, how-it-works, carousel, testimonials, pricing-cta); implement smooth scroll navigation using CSS scroll-behavior: smooth or scrollIntoView with smooth behavior
Create a landing page-specific navigation component with anchor links to each major section; implement scroll spy functionality to highlight the active section link as the user scrolls
Create a custom hook using Intersection Observer to track which section is currently visible in the viewport and return the active section ID for highlighting in navigation
Conditionally render LandingPageNav component when on the landing page route, replacing or augmenting the standard navigation links
